<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>catalog or itil role required to read sc_request records</description><name>sc_request</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = false;
var qstring ="u_item_requested_by="+gs.getUserID()+"^ORu_item_requested_for="+gs.getUserID();
var RITM_REC = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
RITM_REC.addQuery('request',current.sys_id);
RITM_REC.addEncodedQuery(qstring);
RITM_REC.query();
if(RITM_REC.next()){
answer = true;

}

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-30 04:13:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>475a4e284f102300dc6922788310c775</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sc_request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_475a4e284f102300dc6922788310c775</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mkuriako</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-30 04:28:03</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: standardc.navbar { transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; -webkit-transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; border: 0; border-bottom: 4px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; } .navbar-fade { opacity: 0.4; } .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle { border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); } header[role="banner"], .nav > li > a { max-height: 60px; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px){ .nav > li > a { padding-right: 0.5rem; padding-left: 0.5rem; } } .navbar-brand { max-height: 60px; padding: 0; padding-bottom: 0.5rem; } .navbar-brand img, .navbar-brand span { margin-left: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-right: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-top: $sp-logo-margin-y; margin-bottom: $sp-logo-margin-y; display: block; max-height: $sp-logo-max-height; max-width: $sp-logo-max-width; position: relative; top: 50%; -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%); -ms-transform: translateY(-50%); transform: translateY(-50%); } .breadcrumb-container { background-color: $panel-bg; } /* for mobile app */ .navbar-inverse.is-native { background-color: #405060; } nav{ margin-bottom: 0px; border-radius: 0px; } .navbar-collapse{ padding-right: 0px; } .navbar-nav { margin: 0px; } // PRB711244: Dropdown menu is scrollable when too many items .scrollable-dropdown { max-height: 80vh; overflow: auto; height: auto; } .is-native { .scrollable-dropdown { max-height: 100vh; overflow: scroll; height: auto; } } /* PRB923910: Fix for Service Portal - Header Poorly Aligned in Safari */ @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { .navbar-collapse { display: flex !important; } }sp_instancefalsefalse 0) $(this).removeClass('in').addClass('collapse'); }); }]]>OCIO SR Header Menutruefalsesp_header_footerJames.Jose2018-06-01 20:57:11320156bfdb9213003d1dd001cf9619ca4OCIO SR Header Menuglobalglobalsp_header_footer_320156bfdb9213003d1dd001cf9619caJames.Jose2018-08-16 04:20:03

font-size: 2.5rem; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.1; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px 0; } /* TOP ICON ---------- */ a.top_icon { display: block; padding: 20px; text-align: center; } a.top_icon .fa { display: block; } a.color_box .fa { position:absolute; left: 20px; top: 20px; width:42px; text-align: center; } .icon-link-background-primary { background-color: $brand-primary; } .icon-link-background-info { background-color: $brand-info; sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_task">close_notesISNOTEMPTY^close_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="close_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="close_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update RITM Worknotes</name><order>500</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var RITM_Record = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');				
					RITM_Record.addQuery('sys_id',current.request_item);
					RITM_Record.query();
					if(RITM_Record.next()) 
						{
						if(RITM_Record.close_notes!= ''){
							
						RITM_Record.close_notes=RITM_Record.close_notes+"\n"+current.number+" - "+current.close_notes;
						
						}
						
						else{
							
						RITM_Record.close_notes=current.number+" - "+current.close_notes;
						
						}
						
						RITM_Record.update();
						}
						
						

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-13 16:02:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6059c9174f331300c8030fbf9310c78b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update RITM Worknotes</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6059c9174f331300c8030fbf9310c78b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mkuriako</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-29 00:56:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6059c9174f331300c8030fbf9310c78b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_e868d7a2dbd313003d1dd001cf961972
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of SC Scroll to top">2468d7a2dbd313003d1dd001cf961970</child><cloned>2018-07-17 21:59:15</cloned><last_validated>2018-07-17 21:59:15</last_validated><parent display_value="SC Scroll to top">9cfd91940b4103002600425663673a31</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category/><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, $element) {
	var c = this;
	$element.hide();
	var height = c.options.height_from_top || 300;
	height = parseInt(height);
	var lastScrollTop = 0;
	var container = angular.element('.sp-scroll');

	container.on("scroll", function() {
		var currentScroll = angular.element(container).scrollTop();
		if(lastScrollTop > currentScroll && lastScrollTop > height && currentScroll > height) // moving up
			$element.show();
		else
			$element.hide();
		lastScrollTop = currentScroll;
	});


	$scope.goTop = function() {
		spUtil.scrollTo('.sp-scroll', 300);
	}

}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>@media only screen and (max-width : 992px) {
.button-to-top {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin-right: 15px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border-radius: 5px !important;
    opacity: 0.7 !important;
    padding: 12px !important;
    border: 1px solid !important;
    width: 47px;
    height: 45px;
    background-color: #ddd;
  }
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>sc_scroll_to_top</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>SC Scroll to top</name><option_schema>[{"hint":"Height from top (px) after which control would display","name":"height_from_top","section":"other","default_value":"300","label":"Height from top (px)","type":"integer"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {

})();]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-09-02 20:45:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>9cfd91940b4103002600425663673a31</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SC Scroll to top</sys_name><sys_package display_value="">37c5cea187233200e0ef0cf888cb0bb8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_9cfd91940b4103002600425663673a31</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-09-04 09:41:14</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
	<button name="gotoTop" ng-click="goTop()" class="visible-xs visible-sm btn fa fa-arrow-up fa-lg padder-lg button-to-top pull-right"></button>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-17 21:59:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>e868d7a2dbd313003d1dd001cf961972</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>2468d7a2dbd313003d1dd001cf961970</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_e868d7a2dbd313003d1dd001cf961972</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-17 21:59:15</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_2d342c68db9023007a74fe1b689619a2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e801f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961935</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Effective Date</name><order>400</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Effective Date not to set in Past
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-645 11-July-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
		
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
		return;
	}

	// This assign to the local value seems to be necessary
	var effective_date = newValue; 
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax("OCIO_SR_HelperUtils");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "getDateComparison");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_date_to_check", effective_date);
	ga.getXML(cbIsPast);
	
	function cbIsPast(response) {          
				
		var isInPast = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		// Hide existing msg first to avoid to display more than once per control
		g_form.hideFieldMsg('u_effective_date', true);
		
		var msg = 'Date must not be in the past. ' + effective_date;
		if(isInPast == "true"){
			g_form.showFieldMsg('u_effective_date', msg, "error", false); 
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MUNGIM</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-29 20:49:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2d342c68db9023007a74fe1b689619a2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Effective Date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2d342c68db9023007a74fe1b689619a2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-29 22:41:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d9a26b3e4f671300c8030fbf9310c7da
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make Fields Read Only</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Helper Functions for Service Request Project
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-43 16-August-2018 Mathew Kuriakose   Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */



function onLoad() {
	
var CheckIsMemberOfObj = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.getXML(script_response);
 
function script_response(response) {
	
var script_answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

if(script_answer == 'true')
{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', false);



}

else

{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', true);
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', true);

}

}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-31 03:39:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d9a26b3e4f671300c8030fbf9310c7da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Fields Read Only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d9a26b3e4f671300c8030fbf9310c7da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mkuriako</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-24 01:45:02</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_1896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896194b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0496b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619e8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Mobile Phone Number</name><order>600</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Mobile Phone Number to the format: ### ###-####
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-####.
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 6-June-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation 
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}

    var formControlName = 'u_mobile_phone';	
	
	// Remove the invalidation message first not to display more than once
	g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);
	
    // Get formatted phone number
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_formatPhoneByPattern');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_phone', newValue);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_include_phone_extension', 'false');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_phone_number_regular_expression_pattern', '^[0-9]{10}$');
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
}

function cbFtn(answer){
	
	var formControlName = 'u_mobile_phone';
	if (answer) {		
		var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
		var phoneFormatted = retObj.phoneFormatted;
		var phoneOriginal = retObj.phoneOriginal;
		var invalidMsg = retObj.invalidMsg;
		if (invalidMsg != '') {
			var invalidMsgToDefault = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number.';
			var invalidMsgToDisplay = invalidMsgToDefault + ' ' + phoneOriginal;
			g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsgToDisplay, "error");
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, '');
		} else {
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, phoneFormatted);
		}		
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896194b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Mobile Phone Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896194b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-20 18:12:57</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make Requested for Read Only</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Helper Functions for Service Request Project
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-366 16-August-2018 Mathew Kuriakose   Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */

function onLoad() {
	
var CheckIsMemberOfObj = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.getXML(script_response);
 
function script_response(response) {
	
var script_answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
if(script_answer == 'true')
{
    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', false);
}

else{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', true);

}
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-17 02:32:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Requested for Read Only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mkuriako</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-29 01:37:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_9896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896196b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4096b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619d8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Postalcoder per Selected Address</name><order>300</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Postalcode
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 11-July-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation  
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

   if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
      return;
   }
   	
   var postalCodeCtrlName = 'u_postal_code';
   var _addressTableName = 'x_215090_ocio_madr_ocio_master_address_list_custom_table';
   var streetSelected = newValue;
	
   g_form.clearValue(postalCodeCtrlName);

	// Execute Script Include to set the Street Options
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIOMasterAddressList');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getPostalcodeByStreet');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_streetVal', streetSelected);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_addressTable', _addressTableName);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(callback);
	
	function callback(answer) {
	
		if (answer) {
			var postalCode = answer;
			g_form.setValue(postalCodeCtrlName, postalCode);
		}
	}   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896196b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Postalcoder per Selected Address</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896196b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-16 17:58:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>1</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_7001f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961976
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Change Account-v1">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7401f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961946</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default from Requested For</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	//Get value from script include
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid',  newValue);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);	
	function cbFtn(answer) {		
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			//Set short description of task
				var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Change Account for '+ retObj.username;
				g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
				//Set Requested for organization
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-14 16:33:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7001f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961976</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default from Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7001f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961976</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-14 16:33:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_34064093db4713003d1dd001cf961985
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR Add Attachment</name><order>900</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Add attachment to the service catalog task for the specific service catalog items fulfillment
 *
 *
 * Pre-requisites:
 * 1. Service Catalog Item needs to configure a variable names as 'hidden_sc_item_name_for_attachment'  for this business rule - (see Switch staement)
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-213  27-Jun-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation for Update Contact Information (GAL) catalog item fulfillment
 * SB-59   25-July-2018 Munhwan Gim      Support for User Account Status Change Complete Fulfillment
 * SB-556  17-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim      Fix defect: fax number is undefined on JSON file
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request
 **/
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var request_itemRef = current.request_item.getRefRecord();
	var cat_itemRef = request_itemRef.cat_item.getRefRecord();
	
	var sc_item_number = request_itemRef.getValue('number');
	var userNameRequestedFor = getUserNameById(request_itemRef.variables.u_requested_for);
	
	// Need single-quote for make SWITCH statment work. Otherwise use toString() with double-quote on SWITCH - CASE
	var sc_item_name = cat_itemRef.name+'';
	
	var scTaskId = current.getValue("sys_id");
	var scItemVars = request_itemRef.variables;
	var dataToAttach = '';
	
	var HIDDEN_SC_ITEM_NAME = scItemVars.hidden_sc_item_name_for_attachment+'';
	var fileName = '';
	
	// Cases must be matched with sc_cat_item name to be handled specifically. This block might be refactored as more service is implemented.
	switch (HIDDEN_SC_ITEM_NAME) {
		case 'Update Contact Information':
		fileName = 'GALData_'+sc_item_number+'.json';
		
		dataToAttach = getGALData(userNameRequestedFor, current.short_description, current.description, scItemVars);
		addAttachmentToServiceCatalogTask(current, dataToAttach, scTaskId, fileName, 'application/json');
		break;
		case 'Change Account':
		fileName = 'ChangeAccountData_'+sc_item_number+'.json';
		var iWantToSelected = request_itemRef.variables.u_i_want_to;
		
		dataToAttach = getChangeAccountData(iWantToSelected, userNameRequestedFor, scItemVars);
		addAttachmentToServiceCatalogTask(current, dataToAttach, scTaskId, fileName, 'application/json');
		break;
		default:
		gs.info('>>>DEBUG:: OCIO SC TASK Add Attachment: Do not need to add attachment when a new sc task is inserted. The Service Catalog Item = (' + HIDDEN_SC_ITEM_NAME + ')');
		break;
	}
	
	/**
 	* Add attachment for the table, sc_task, with the attachment data
 	* @param: current: service catalog task (object)
 	* @param: attachmentData: attachment data
 	* @param: scTaskId: attachment table_sys_id value to be assigned
 	* @param: fileName: attachment file name
 	* @param: contentType: attachment content type, which should be matached with the content of 'attachmentData'
 	* @return: none
 	*/
	function addAttachmentToServiceCatalogTask(current, attachmentData, scTaskId, fileName, contentType) {
		// Set Attachment Inputs
		var gsAttach = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var idAttached = gsAttach.write(current, fileName, contentType, attachmentData);
		
		// Set table_sys_id on the attachment
		var att = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		att.addQuery('sys_id', idAttached);
		att.query();
		if (att.next()) {
			att.table_sys_id = scTaskId;
			att.update();
		}
		
	}
	
	/**
 	* Generate JSON for GAL Update Request mapped with JSON Schema from the IBM
 	* @param: userID: sys_id of the user table
 	* @return: user name
 	*/
	function getUserNameById( userID ) {
		var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grUser.addQuery('sys_id', userID);
		grUser.query();
		
		var userName = '';
		
		if (grUser.next()) {
			userName = grUser.user_name;
		} else {
			gs.warn('>>> DEBUG: No user name found for a ' + userID);
		}
		
		return userName;
	}
	
	/**
 	* Generate JSON for GAL Update Request mapped with JSON Schema from the IBM
 	* @param: reqFor: IDIR user name (string)
 	* @param: shortDesc: service catalog Item short description (string)
 	* @param: desc: service catalog Item description (string)
 	* @param: scItem: service catalog Item variables object
 	* @return: json string
 	*/
	function getGALData(reqFor, shortDesc, desc, scItem) {
		return '{'
			+		'"GALUpdateRequest": {'
				+			'"IDIR": "' +  reqFor + '",'
				+			'"GALOrganizationInfo": {'
					+				'"adminNote": "' + desc + '",'
					+				'"assistant": "' + scItem.u_assistant + '",'
					+				'"BCGovInfo": "' + "" + '",'
					+				'"company": "' +  scItem.u_organization + '",'
					+				'"department": "' + scItem.u_department + '",'
					+				'"description": "' + shortDesc + '",'
					+				'"jobTitle": "' + scItem.u_title + '",'
					+				'"manager": "' +  "" + '",'
					+				'"office": "' + scItem.u_office + '"'
					+			'},'
					+			'"GALContactInfo": {'
						+				'"city": "' + scItem.u_city + '",'
						+				'"country": "Canada",'
						+				'"fax": "' + scItem.u_fax_number + '",'
						+				'"mobile": "' + scItem.u_mobile_phone + '",'
						+				'"pager": "' + scItem.u_pager + '",'
						+				'"postalCode": "' + scItem.u_postal_code + '",'
						+				'"province": "BC",'
						+				'"street": "' + scItem.u_address + '",'
						+				'"telephoneNotes": "' + "" + '",'
						+				'"telephoneNumber": "' + scItem.u_business_phone + '"'
						+			'}'
						+		'}'
						+'}';
					}
					
					/**
 					* Generate JSON for Change Account Request mapped with JSON Schema from the IBM
 					* @param: optionSelected: IDIR user name (string)
 					* @param: reqFor: IDIR user name (string)
 					* @param: scItem: service catalog Item variables object
 					* @return: json string
 					*/
					function getChangeAccountData(optionSelected, reqFor, scItem) {
						
						var TIME_PORTION_APPENDED = 'T17:00:00-00:00';
						var OPTION = optionSelected+'';
						var json = '';
						
						switch (OPTION) {
							case 'u_change_account_expiry_date':
							json = '{'
								+ '"userExpiryDateChange": {'
									+        '"IDIR": "' +  reqFor + '",'
									+        '"expiryDate": "' + scItem.u_account_expiry_date + TIME_PORTION_APPENDED + '"'
									+	'}'
									+'}';
									break;
									case 'u_remove_account_expiry_date':
									json = '{'
										+ '"userExpiryDateChange": {'
											+        '"IDIR": "' +  reqFor + '",'
											+        '"expiryDate": "1601-01-01T00:00:00-00:00"'
											+	'}'
											+'}';
											break;
											case 'u_place_hold':
											json = '{'
												+ '"removeUserAccountHold": {'
													+        '"IDIR": "' +  reqFor + '",'
													+        '"effectiveDate": "' + scItem.u_effective_date + TIME_PORTION_APPENDED + '"'
													+	'}'
													+'}';
													break;
													case 'u_remove_hold':
													json = '{'
														+ '"userAccountHold": {'
															+        '"IDIR": "' +  reqFor + '",'
															+        '"effectiveDate": "' + scItem.u_effective_date + TIME_PORTION_APPENDED + '"'
															+	'}'
															+'}';
															break;
															default:
															gs.info('>>>DEBUG:: OCIO SC TASK Add Attachment: Change Account: The selected IWantTo Option = (' + optionSelected + ')');
															break;
														}
														
														return json;
													}
												})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-07 04:24:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>34064093db4713003d1dd001cf961985</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR Add Attachment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_34064093db4713003d1dd001cf961985</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-17 20:40:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=34064093db4713003d1dd001cf961985"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_9ff8efb0db9213003d1dd001cf961929
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="OCIO SC Suggested Items">5bf8efb0db9213003d1dd001cf961927</child><cloned>2018-04-30 23:46:43</cloned><last_validated>2018-04-30 23:46:43</last_validated><parent display_value="SC Popular Items">cbcacf13cb21020000f8d856634c9ca0</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>sc</category><client_script/><controller_as/><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list>sc_catalog</field_list><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>SC Popular Items</name><option_schema>[{"hint":"Max number of popular items shown (if empty, defaults to 9)","name":"limit","default_value":"9","section":"Behavior","label":"Limit","type":"integer"},{"hint":"Include requests made through Record Producers","name":"include_record_producers","section":"Behavior","label":"Include Record Producers","type":"boolean"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles>snc_external,snc_internal</roles><script><![CDATA[data.sc_catalog = $sp.getValue('sc_catalogs') || $sp.getValue('sc_catalog');
data.showPrices = $sp.showCatalogPrices();
data.limit = options.limit || 9;
var items = [];

var count = new GlideAggregate('sc_req_item');
count.addAggregate('COUNT','cat_item');
count.groupBy('cat_item');
count.addQuery('cat_item.sys_class_name', 'NOT IN', 'sc_cat_item_guide,sc_cat_item_wizard,sc_cat_item_content');
count.addQuery('cat_item.sc_catalogs', 'IN', data.sc_catalog);
count.addEncodedQuery('cat_item.hide_sp=false^ORcat_item.hide_spISEMPTY');
count.orderByAggregate('COUNT', 'cat_item');
count.query();
while (count.next() && items.length < data.limit) {
  if (!$sp.canReadRecord("sc_cat_item", count.cat_item.sys_id.getDisplayValue()))
    continue; // user does not have permission to see this item

  var item = {};
  item.count = count.getAggregate('COUNT', 'cat_item');
  item.name = count.cat_item.name.getDisplayValue();
  item.short_description = count.cat_item.short_description.getDisplayValue();
  item.picture = count.cat_item.picture.getDisplayValue();
  item.price = count.cat_item.price.getDisplayValue();
  item.hasPrice = count.cat_item.price != 0;
  item.sys_id = count.cat_item.sys_id.getDisplayValue();
  items.push(item);
}

if (options.include_record_producers == 'true' || options.include_record_producers == true) {
	var producers = 0;
	count = new GlideAggregate('sc_item_produced_record');
	count.addQuery('producer.sc_catalogs', 'IN', data.sc_catalog);
	count.addEncodedQuery('producer.hide_sp=false^ORproducer.hide_spISEMPTY');
	count.addAggregate('COUNT', 'producer');
	count.groupBy('producer');
	count.orderByAggregate('COUNT', 'producer');
	count.query();
	while (count.next() && producers < data.limit) {
		
		var catalogItemJS = new sn_sc.CatItem(count.getValue('producer'));
		if (!catalogItemJS.canView(gs.isMobile()) || !catalogItemJS.isVisibleServicePortal())
			continue;
		var catItemDetails = catalogItemJS.getItemSummary();

		var item = {};
		item.count = count.getAggregate('COUNT', 'producer');
		item.name = catItemDetails.name;
		item.short_description = catItemDetails.short_description;
		item.picture = catItemDetails.picture;
		item.price = catItemDetails.price;
		item.hasPrice = item.price != 0;
		item.sys_id = catItemDetails.sys_id;
		item.page = 'sc_cat_item';
		items.push(item);
		producers++;
	}
}

data.items = items;]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-08-04 00:10:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>cbcacf13cb21020000f8d856634c9ca0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>129</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SC Popular Items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Service Catalog" source="com.glide.service-portal.service-catalog">57f4b2b2799203006517636e4f5349a0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_cbcacf13cb21020000f8d856634c9ca0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-04 13:44:39</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<h1 class="font-thin m-t-none">{{::options.title}}</h1>

<div class="row" >
  <div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4" ng-repeat="item in data.items | orderBy: '-count' | limitTo: data.limit">

    <div class="panel panel-default">
      <a href="?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id={{item.sys_id}}" class="panel-body block">
        <div class="overflow-100">
          <h2 class="h4 m-t-none m-b-xs text-overflow-ellipsis" title="{{::item.name}}">{{::item.name}}</h2>
          <img ng-src="{{::item.picture}}" ng-if="::item.picture" class="m-r-sm m-b-sm item-image pull-left" alt="{{::item.name}}" role="presentation" />
          <div class="text-muted item-short-desc">{{::item.short_description}}</div>
        </div>
      </a>
      <div class="panel-footer">
        <a href="?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id={{item.sys_id}}" class="pull-left text-muted" tabindex="-1">${View Details}</a> <span ng-if="data.showPrices && item.hasPrice" class="pull-right item-price font-bold">{{::item.price}}</span> &nbsp;
      </div>
    </div>

  </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-23 19:39:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>9ff8efb0db9213003d1dd001cf961929</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>5bf8efb0db9213003d1dd001cf961927</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_9ff8efb0db9213003d1dd001cf961929</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-23 19:39:39</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>

$scope.stopLoader = false; $scope.server.update().then(function (){ $scope.data.limit = $scope.data.new_limit; $scope.stopLoader = true; }) } $scope.onClick = function($event, item) { var lp = getLinkParts(item); if (typeof lp == "string") return; // can't intercept/redirect external content item $event.stopPropagation(); $event.preventDefault(); var evt = {item: item, search: lp}; // This will let a wrapper widget intercept and redirect somewhere else $scope.$emit($scope.options.click_event_name, evt); }; function getLinkParts(item) { if (item.sys_class_name == 'sc_cat_item_content' && item.content_type == 'external') return item.url; return {id: item.page, sys_id: item.sys_id, sysparm_category: $scope.data.category_id}; $scope.isMobile = false; }); } else { $timeout(function() { $scope.view = 'card'; $scope.isMobile = true; }) } } $scope.$on("$destroy", function() { unregister(); listenerForCatItems(); if (mql) mql.removeListener(handleMatchMedia); sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow read for all fields in sc_request, for users with roles (catalog, itil), and if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>sc_request.*</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = true;

if(gs.getUser().hasRole("bcgov_sr_service_manager")){
	answer = false;

assignTo = ''; var shortDescTemplate = ''; var descTemplate = ''; assignmentGrp = current.variables.sc_task_assignmentGroupName; assignTo = current.variables.sc_task_assignToName; if (current.variables.sc_task_shortDescTemplate) { shortDescTemplate = current.variables.sc_task_shortDescTemplate.toString(); } if (current.variables.sc_task_descriptionTemplate) { descTemplate = current.variables.sc_task_descriptionTemplate.toString(); } var assignmentGroup_id = getSysIDByName('sys_user_group', assignmentGrp); var assignTo_id = getSysIDByName('sys_user', assignTo); var shortDesc = replaceStringIntempalte(shortDescTemplate, current); var desc = replaceStringIntempalte(descTemplate, current); if (assignmentGrp && assignmentGroup_id) { task.assignment_group = assignmentGroup_id; } if (assignTo && assignTo_id) { task.assigned_to = assignTo_id; } if (shortDescTemplate && shortDesc) { task.short_description = shortDesc; } else { gs.warn('>>> CAN NOT set task SHORT description, and Cat Item'); } if (descTemplate && desc) { task.description = desc; } else { gs.warn('>>> CAN NOT set task Description'); } // Set custom field for the requested For on sc_req_item var requestedForName = getUserNameById(current.variables.u_requested_for); //current.u_item_requested_for = requestedForName; current.setValue('u_item_requested_for', current.variables.u_requested_for, requestedForName); var requestedByName = getUserNameById(current.variables.u_requested_by); current.setValue('u_item_requested_by', current.variables.u_requested_by, requestedByName); current.setValue('u_item_notify_requested_for', current.variables.u_notify_req_for, current.variables.u_notify_req_for ); current.setValue('u_item_notify_requested_by', current.variables.u_notify_me, current.variables.u_notify_me ); function getSysIDByName(tableName, name) { var sysid = ''; var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName); gr.get('name', name); return gr.sys_id; } function getUserNameById(sysId) { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); gr.get('sys_id', sysId); return gr.user_name; } function replaceStringIntempalte(templateStr, current) { //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT 1 on replaceStringIntempalte()'); var retVal = templateStr; var rxp = /\{([^}]+)\}/g; var curMatch; while (curMatch = rxp.exec( templateStr )) { //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT 2 on replaceStringIntempalte() --' + curMatch[1]); var key = '{' + curMatch[1] + '}'; if (curMatch[1] == 'short_description') { retVal = retVal.replace( key, GlideEvaluator.evaluateString('current.' + curMatch[1])); } else { retVal = retVal.replace( key, GlideEvaluator.evaluateString('current.variables.' + curMatch[1])); } } //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT on replaceStringIntempalte() -- (' + retVal + ') --- with Template: (' + templateStr +')' ); return retVal; }98b96f90c0a800666b58ec516f330397wf_activitya314189f4f442300dc6922788310c7e1300sys_variable_valuemkuriako2018-08-25 History * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 5 July 2018: Initial implementation **/ var assignmentGrp = ''; var assignTo = ''; var shortDescTemplate = ''; var descTemplate = ''; assignmentGrp = current.variables.sc_task_assignmentGroupName; assignTo = current.variables.sc_task_assignToName; if (current.variables.sc_task_shortDescTemplate) { shortDescTemplate = current.variables.sc_task_shortDescTemplate.toString(); } if (current.variables.sc_task_descriptionTemplate) { descTemplate = current.variables.sc_task_descriptionTemplate.toString(); } var assignmentGroup_id = getSysIDByName('sys_user_group', assignmentGrp); var assignTo_id = getSysIDByName('sys_user', assignTo); var shortDesc = replaceStringIntempalte(shortDescTemplate, current); var desc = replaceStringIntempalte(descTemplate, current); if (assignmentGrp && assignmentGroup_id) { task.assignment_group = assignmentGroup_id; } if (assignTo && assignTo_id) { task.assigned_to = assignTo_id; } if (shortDescTemplate && shortDesc) { task.short_description = shortDesc; } else { gs.warn('>>> CAN NOT set task SHORT description, and Cat Item'); } if (descTemplate && desc) { task.description = desc; } else { gs.warn('>>> CAN NOT set task Description'); } // Set custom field for the requested For on sc_req_item var requestedForName = getUserNameById(current.variables.u_requested_for); //current.u_item_requested_for = requestedForName; current.setValue('u_item_requested_for', current.variables.u_requested_for, requestedForName); var requestedByName = getUserNameById(current.variables.u_requested_by); current.setValue('u_item_requested_by', current.variables.u_requested_by, requestedByName); current.setValue('u_item_notify_requested_for', current.variables.u_notify_req_for, current.variables.u_notify_req_for ); current.setValue('u_item_notify_requested_by', current.variables.u_notify_me, current.variables.u_notify_me ); function getSysIDByName(tableName, name) { var sysid = ''; var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName); gr.get('name', name); return gr.sys_id; } function getUserNameById(sysId) { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); gr.get('sys_id', sysId); return gr.user_name; } function replaceStringIntempalte(templateStr, current) { //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT 1 on replaceStringIntempalte()'); var retVal = templateStr; var rxp = /\{([^}]+)\}/g; var curMatch; while (curMatch = rxp.exec( templateStr )) { //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT 2 on replaceStringIntempalte() --' + curMatch[1]); var key = '{' + curMatch[1] + '}'; if (curMatch[1] == 'short_description') { retVal = retVal.replace( key, GlideEvaluator.evaluateString('current.' + curMatch[1])); } else { retVal = retVal.replace( key, GlideEvaluator.evaluateString('current.variables.' + curMatch[1])); } } //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT on replaceStringIntempalte() -- (' + retVal + ') --- with Template: (' + templateStr +')' ); return retVal; }98b96f90c0a800666b58ec516f330397wf_activitya314189f4f442300dc6922788310c7e11700sys_variable_valuemkuriako2018-08-25 sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="OCIO Data Table from Instance Definition">7a7ef692db325300f72fe04a48961995</child><cloned>2018-06-22 04:56:12</cloned><last_validated>2018-06-22 04:56:12</last_validated><parent display_value="Data Table from Instance Definition">38058ff1cb11020000f8d856634c9c8c</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>standard</category><client_script><![CDATA[function ($scope, spUtil, $location, spAriaFocusManager) {
	$scope.$on('data_table.click', function(e, parms){
		var p = $scope.data.page_id || 'form';
		var s = {id: p, table: parms.table, sys_id: parms.sys_id, view: 'sp'};
		var newURL = $location.search(s);
		spAriaFocusManager.navigateToLink(newURL.url());
	});
}]]></client_script><controller_as/><css/><data_table>sp_instance_table</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list>table,filter,field_list,maximum_entries,order_by,order_direction,title,color,glyph,sp_page</field_list><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Data Table from Instance Definition</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function(){
	/*  "use strict"; - linter issues */
	// populate the 'data' object
	var sp_page = $sp.getValue('sp_page');
	var pageGR = new GlideRecord('sp_page');
	pageGR.get(sp_page);
	data.page_id = pageGR.id.getDisplayValue();
	$sp.getValues(data);
	if (data.field_list) {
		data.fields_array = data.field_list.split(',');
	} else {
		data.field_list = $sp.getListColumns(data.table);
	}

	if (input) {
		data.p = input.p;
		data.o = input.o;
		data.d = input.d;
		data.q = input.q;
	}
	data.p = data.p || 1;
	data.o = data.o || $sp.getValue('order_by');
	data.d = data.d || $sp.getValue('order_direction');

	data.page_index = (data.p - 1);
	data.window_size = $sp.getValue('maximum_entries') || 10;
	data.window_start  = (data.page_index * data.window_size);
	data.window_end = (((data.page_index + 1) * data.window_size));
	data.filter = $sp.getValue("filter");

	var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(data.table);
	if (!gr.isValid()) {
		data.invalid_table = true;
		data.table_label = data.table;
		return;
	}
	data.table_label = gr.getLabel();

	var widgetParams = {
		table: data.table,
		fields: data.field_list,
		o: data.o,
		d: data.d,
		filter: data.filter,
		window_size: data.window_size,
		view: 'sp',
		title: options.title,
		show_breadcrumbs: true
	};
	data.dataTableWidget = $sp.getWidget('widget-data-table', widgetParams);
})();]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-07-17 21:37:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>38058ff1cb11020000f8d856634c9c8c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>229</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data Table from Instance Definition</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">b23773bb14a11300651763392430a411</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_38058ff1cb11020000f8d856634c9c8c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-24 19:03:13</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
  <div class="alert alert-danger" ng-if="data.invalid_table">
    ${Table not defined} '{{data.table_label}}'
  </div>
  <sp-widget ng-if="data.dataTableWidget" widget="data.dataTableWidget"></sp-widget>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-22 04:56:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>7e7ef692db325300f72fe04a48961998</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>7a7ef692db325300f72fe04a48961995</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_7e7ef692db325300f72fe04a48961998</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-22 04:56:12</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_706326864f2613006e76ff6f9310c778
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OCIOMasterAddressList</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>BC Public Service, OCIO. Ajax Server side functions to populate Street per City.</description><name>OCIOMasterAddressList</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Server Class for GlideAjax call 
 * 
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 09-Jun-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation
 * SB-239 04-Jul-2018  James Jose       When City (catalog variable) is changed, address should be blank  
 * SB-579 21-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim      Update two ftns - getStreets and getPostalcodeByStreet - to handle the deleted Address
 * SB-623 23-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim      Sort by sequence followed by street
 **/
var OCIOMasterAddressList = Class.create();
OCIOMasterAddressList.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	// Return list of street per City by Querying against custom lookup table
	// Input param: city value
	// Custom Table
	getStreets: function() {
	 
		var myUserObject = gs.getUser();		
	    var citySelected = this.getParameter('sysparm_cityVal');
		var addressTableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_addressTable');
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord(addressTableName);
		var strQuery = 'u_type!=DELETE^ORu_type=^u_city=' + citySelected;
		gr.addEncodedQuery(strQuery);
		gr.orderBy('u_sequence');
        	gr.orderBy('u_street');
		gr.query();
		
		var listStates = [];
		listStates.push({value: '', label: '--None--'});
		while (gr.next()) {
			
		    var streetObj = {};
			streetObj.value = gr.u_street.getDisplayValue();
			streetObj.label = gr.u_street.getDisplayValue();
			streetObj.selected = true;
			
			listStates.push(streetObj);
		}
		
		var response = JSON.stringify(listStates);

		return response;
	},
	
	// Return Postal coder based on selected Street by Querying against custom lookup table
	// Input param: street value
	// Custom Table
	getPostalcodeByStreet: function() {
	 
		var myUserObject = gs.getUser();		
	    var streetSelected = this.getParameter('sysparm_streetVal');
		var addressTableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_addressTable');
				
		var gr = new GlideRecord(addressTableName);
		var strQuery = 'u_type!=DELETE^ORu_type=^u_street=' + streetSelected;
		gr.addEncodedQuery(strQuery);		
		gr.query();
		
		var postalCode = '';
		
		while (gr.next()) {
			postalCode = gr.u_postal;
		}
		
		return postalCode;
	},
    type: 'OCIOMasterAddressList'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-08 22:06:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>706326864f2613006e76ff6f9310c778</sys_id><sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIOMasterAddressList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_706326864f2613006e76ff6f9310c778</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-23 22:58:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_0e13b13bdb0023007a74fe1b689619c1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:6801f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf96192a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Visibility of Account Expiry Date</name><order>300</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Make 'Account Expiry Date' only for the case 'Change Account Expiry Date' selection on IWantTo...
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-649 27-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation  
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project 
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
/**
	//If for when they want to change the account expiry date
	if(newValue == 'u_change_account_expiry_date') {
		g_form.setVisible('u_account_expiry_date', true); 
		g_form.hideFieldMsg('u_account_expiry_date',true);
	}
	else {
		g_form.setVisible('u_account_expiry_date', false); 
	}
**/
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MUNGIM</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-27 18:41:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0e13b13bdb0023007a74fe1b689619c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Visibility of Account Expiry Date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0e13b13bdb0023007a74fe1b689619c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-29 22:09:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Set Visibility of Account Expiry Date

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Values From Current User</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-203 10-Jun-2018  James Jose      Initial implementation
 * SB-662 28-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim     Use Phone number not User name for sc_item_request_display_name
 *
 **/
function onLoad() {
	
	//Set organization based on the user
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	//Get value from script include at the server side
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', userID);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
	
	function cbFtn(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			
			//Set short description of task
			//var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Reset Voice Mail Password for ' + retObj.username;  
			//g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
			//Set Requested for organization
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 16:45:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Values From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-28 22:05:30</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Set Default Values From Current User

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_9496f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961951
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Fields From Current User</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 07-July-2018  Munhwan Gim     Initial implementation  
 * SB-188 07-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim      Fix defects re: phone number validations
 * SB-622 23-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim      Validation on title and assistant field
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project  
 **/
function onLoad() {
   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var userName = g_user.userName;	
	var itemID = g_form.getUniqueValue();	
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserItemById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', userID);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_item_sysid', itemID);
	
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
		
	function cbFtn(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
                        			
			g_form.setValue('u_city',  retObj.city, retObj.city); 
			g_form.setValue('u_address', retObj.street, retObj.street); 
			g_form.setValue('u_postal_code', retObj.zip, retObj.zip);
				
                        // Validate Department	
                        var departmentMaxLength = 64;
                        if (retObj.u_ad_department.length <= departmentMaxLength) {
			   g_form.setValue('u_department', retObj.u_ad_department, retObj.u_ad_department);  
                        } else {
                           var departmentTruncated = retObj.u_ad_department.substring(0, departmentMaxLength);
                           g_form.setValue('u_department', departmentTruncated, departmentTruncated);  
                           g_form.showFieldMsg('u_department', 'Maximum length ' + departmentMaxLength + ' characters. ' + retObj.u_ad_department, "error");
                        }

                        // Validate Office
                        var officeMaxLength = 128;
                        if (retObj.u_delivery_office.length <= officeMaxLength) {
			   g_form.setValue('u_office', retObj.u_delivery_office, retObj.u_delivery_office);  
                        } else {
                           var officeTruncated = retObj.u_delivery_office.substring(0, officeMaxLength);
                           g_form.setValue('u_office', officeTruncated, officeTruncated);  
                           g_form.showFieldMsg('u_office', 'Maximum length ' + officeMaxLength + ' characters. ' + retObj.u_delivery_office, "error");
                        }
			
                        // Validate Title
                        var titleMaxLength = 64;
                        if (retObj.title.length <= titleMaxLength) {
			   g_form.setValue('u_title', retObj.title, retObj.title);  
                        } else {
                           var titleTruncated = retObj.title.substring(0, titleMaxLength);
                           g_form.setValue('u_title', titleTruncated, titleTruncated);  
                           g_form.showFieldMsg('u_title', 'Maximum length ' + titleMaxLength + ' characters. ' + retObj.title, "error");
                        }

                        // Validate Assistant
                        var assistantMaxLength = 76;
                        if (retObj.u_assistant.length <= assistantMaxLength) {
			   g_form.setValue('u_assistant', retObj.u_assistant, retObj.u_assistant);  
                        } else {
                           var assistantTruncated = retObj.u_assistant.substring(0, assistantMaxLength);
                           g_form.setValue('u_assistant', assistantTruncated, assistantTruncated);  
                           g_form.showFieldMsg('u_assistant', 'Maximum length ' + assistantMaxLength + ' characters. ' + retObj.u_assistant, "error");
                        }
			
			// Set hidden varaibel for sc_item_request
			var sc_item_request_display_name = retObj.sc_cat_item_name + ' for ' + retObj.username;
			g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);			

			// Set Phone Number and set validation msg if any
			var invalidMsgPhoneDefault = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number.';
			var invalidMsgPhoneExtensionDefault = invalidMsgPhoneDefault + ' Extensions are entered as "ext" followed by 1 to 4 digits.';
			var invalidMsgToDisplay = '';
			if (retObj.bizPhoneInvalid != '') {
				invalidMsgToDisplay = invalidMsgPhoneExtensionDefault + ' ' + retObj.bizPhoneInvalid;
				g_form.showFieldMsg('u_business_phone', invalidMsgToDisplay, "error");	
			} else {
				g_form.setValue('u_business_phone', retObj.phone, retObj.phone);
			}
			if (retObj.mobilePhoneInvalid != '') {
				invalidMsgToDisplay = invalidMsgPhoneDefault + ' ' + retObj.mobilePhoneInvalid;
				g_form.showFieldMsg('u_mobile_phone', invalidMsgToDisplay, "error");				
			} else {
				g_form.setValue('u_mobile_phone', retObj.mobile_phone, retObj.mobile_phone);
			}
			if (retObj.faxNumberInvalid != '') {
				invalidMsgToDisplay = invalidMsgPhoneDefault + ' ' + retObj.faxNumberInvalid;
				g_form.showFieldMsg('u_fax_number', invalidMsgToDisplay, "error");				
			} else {
				g_form.setValue('u_fax_number', retObj.u_fax_number, retObj.u_fax_number);
			}
			if (retObj.pagerInvalid != '') {
				invalidMsgToDisplay = invalidMsgPhoneDefault + ' ' + retObj.pagerInvalid;
				g_form.showFieldMsg('u_pager', invalidMsgToDisplay, "error");				
			} else {
				g_form.setValue('u_pager', retObj.u_pager, retObj.u_pager); 	
			}				
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9496f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961951</sys_id><sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Fields From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9496f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961951</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mkuriako</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-30 23:20:25</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Set Default Fields From Current User

   g_form.hideFieldMsg('u_effective_date', true);
   //g_form.showFieldMsg('u_effective_date', '', 'info');
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
  g_form.setValue('u_effective_date', '');
  g_form.showFieldMsg('u_effective_date', 'Date must not be in the past.', "error");

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Requested For</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Requested For on Load
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 07-July-2018  Mathew Kuriakose     Initial implementation  

 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project  
 **/
function onLoad() {
   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	if(g_form.getValue('u_requested_for') =='' ){
		
		g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',userID);
		
	}
	
	
			}				
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-30 23:06:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mkuriako</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-30 23:20:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961959
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0896b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619a8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Fax Number</name><order>700</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Fax Number to the format: ### ###-####
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-####.
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 6-June-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation 
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project 
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
		
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}
    	
    var formControlName = 'u_fax_number';	
		
	// Remove the invalidation message first not to display more than once
	g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);
	
    // Get formatted phone number
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_formatPhoneByPattern');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_phone', newValue);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_include_phone_extension', 'false');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_phone_number_regular_expression_pattern', '^[0-9]{10}$');
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
}

function cbFtn(answer){
	
	var formControlName = 'u_fax_number';
	if (answer) {		
		var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
		var phoneFormatted = retObj.phoneFormatted;
		var phoneOriginal = retObj.phoneOriginal;
		var invalidMsg = retObj.invalidMsg;
		if (invalidMsg != '') {
			var invalidMsgToDefault = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number.';
			var invalidMsgToDisplay = invalidMsgToDefault + ' ' + phoneOriginal;
			g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsgToDisplay, "error");
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, '');
		} else {
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, phoneFormatted);
		}		
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961959</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Fax Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961959</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-20 18:13:14</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
